name: French Egg and Bacon Sandwich
author: Amber
summary: French Toast with egg and bacon in the center with maple syrup on top. Sprinkle with powdered sugar if desired.
directions: Dip bread slices in beaten eggs
Heat a lightly oiled griddle or frying pan over medium high heat
Cook until  browned on both sides
Place bacon in a large, deep skillet
Cook over medium high heat until evenly brown
Reserve 1 tablespoon of bacon grease in pan and fry remaining two eggs
Place one piece of   on each of two plates
Place the fried eggs on top of the bread, top the eggs with strips of bacon
Cover with the remaining pieces of French toast
Following that by pouring on the syrup
